text:
5 steps to #workingsafely:

📋 do a COVID-19 risk assessment
🧽 follow cleaning and hygiene rules
🏠 help people work from home
↔️ stay 2m apart where possible
✅ if 2m not possible, take steps to manage risk

Read our new guidance: https://t.co/Sl1G3HOuvy

#StayAlert https://t.co/KZokPZk5HG

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus
